name: estatefox
description: A full-stack real estate application for South Florida property listings, search, and management.

scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.generate:api: cd backend && python scripts/export-openapi.py && cp openapi.json ../frontend/ && cd ../frontend && npm run generate:api
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.lint:backend: cd backend && ruff check . && mypy src/
